definition: A term commonly employed to describe numerical representation or data expressed in a discrete, non-analog format. It is frequently utilized in reference to electronic technology, computing systems, and communication devices.

examples.german: Digitalisierung ist ein wichtiger Trend in der Wirtschaft.
examples.english: Digitalization is an important trend in the economy.

examples.german: Die Fotos sind nur in digitaler Form verfügbar.
examples.english: The photos are only available in digital form.

examples.german: Das Unternehmen hat eine digitale Marketingstrategie entwickelt.
examples.english: The company has developed a digital marketing strategy.

examples.german: Die Schule hat digitale Tafeln in allen Klassenzimmern installiert.
examples.english: The school has installed digital whiteboards in all classrooms.

examples.german: Die Musikindustrie hat sich durch die Digitalisierung stark verändert.
examples.english: The music industry has undergone significant changes due to digitalization.
